glosses: one who does not vote during any voting procedure, one who abstains

examples.text: A partisinin tüm üyeleri çekimser kaldı
examples.translation: All of the members of Party A remained abstain

etymology: From earlier "çekinser", ultimately from çekin- (“to be unwilling”) + -se + -er. Alternatively from çek- (“to pull”) + -imse + -er.
